param.name: rclsid
param.para: The CLSID that identifies the class whose class object is to be retrieved.

param.name: dwClassContext
param.para: The context in which the class is expected to run. For a list of values, see the enumeration.

param.name: locale
param.para: An LCID constant as defined in WinNls.h.

param.name: riid
param.para: The IID of the interface on the object to which a pointer is desired.

param.name: ppv
param.para: The address of pointer variable that receives the interface pointer requested in riid. Upon successful return, *ppv contains the requested interface pointer.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_FAIL.

summary.para: Specifies a method that retrieves a class object.
